特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

【合併】英語IIｂ　１８（経済学部）/英語IIIｂ　１８（経済学部）
授業方法:
Various methods including, pair and group work, listening exercises, dialog construction and presentation.
Each class will consist of various speaking and listening skills, pair work and group activities. Creating and writing theme-based dialogs and presenting them will also be included.

第1回: Introduction, course format, rules and advice, group interview chart, short self-introductions
Review of class introduction.  45 minutes of out of class study.
第2回: Text:  Overview unit, world map, what is famous in ...? common "wh" questions
World map detail points.  One hour of study.
第3回: Text:  Italy, pair work gap information exercise, listening comprehension activity, comparative adjectives
Grammar skills worksheet homework assignment.  One hour or more of study.
第4回: Text:  New Zealand, cultural and historical questions, vocabulary matching exercise, writing-paragraph construction
New Zealand news article and questions.  One hour or more of out of class study.
第5回: Text: China, talking about news, pair work dialog construction and presentation
Review of in-class study.  Revision of dialogs.  One hour or more of study.
第6回: Text: USA, San Francisco area map-giving and confirming directions, pair work gap information activity
Informative detailed directions worksheet assignment.  One hour of out of class study.
第7回: Text:  Switzerland, listening comprehension activity, small group interview chart
Essay:  Switzerland's history of neutrality.  One hour or more of study.
第8回: Text:  Tanzania, choose the correct answer, adverbs of frequency, dialog construction and presentation
Presentation first draft for revision.  One hour or more of out of class study.
第9回: Text:  Australia, pair work interview exchange, listening comprehension activity, writing presentations
Rewriting the presentation.  One hour or more of study.
第10回: Text:  Canada, making comparisons, pair work information gap activity, presentations
Critique of presentations worksheet.  One hour of study.
第11回: Text:  France, overseas travel advice activity, group presentations continued, listening comprehension activity
Essay:  Key points to a good presentation.  One hour of out of class study.
第12回: Text:  Thailand, international customs, car rental role play, What would you rather do ...?
Cultural communicative gaps worksheet assignment.  One hour of study.
第13回: vocabulary game, course review, exam explanation, question and answer session
The course in review, stating opinions.  One hour of study.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students would be advised to do as much personal study outside the classroom as possible.  Also, to submit any homework assignments on time.
